title: RAID: World War II + v15.1 + DLCs
body:
RAID: World War II + v15.1 + DLCs


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, World War II, First-person, 3D
Companies: Lion Game Lion / Starbreeze Studios
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI6
Original Size: 16.5 GB
Repack Size: 6.8 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: 2 hosters (Uploaded by Susch, NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: MegaUp (Uploaded by Sylvano, NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: WorldSrc (NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on RAID.World.War.II.The.Countdown.Raid-CODEX ISO release: codex-raid.world.war.ii.the.countdown.raid.iso (16,684,154,880 bytes)
  • RAID.World.War.II.The.Countdown.Raid.Update.15.1-CODEX (990 MB) installed over
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 16.5 to 6.8 GB)
  • Installation takes 10-15 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 24 GB (up tp 27 GB during installation)
  • Repack uses ZTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

RAID: World War II is an action-packed four player cooperative shooter set in Europe during World War II, where you and your friends aims to thwart the Nazi onslaught. Four prisoners of war – Sterling, Rivet, Kurgan and Wolfgang have been freed by “Mrs. White,” a secret British Intelligence Operative, who needs someone to take down Hitler and his Third Reich once and for all. Their objective is to fight the war – without rules or mercy. Their reward is all the Nazi gold they can carry.

JOHN CLEESE – Comedy legend John Cleese plays Control – a British Intelligence Agent working for Mrs. White. His job is to make sure that you have plenty of Nazis to fight and lots of gold to steal.

Backwards compatibility

This repack IS NOT BACKWARDS COMPATIBLE with my previous repack of the game.
